app_url.description: Application URL (domain if provided, else ALB DNS).

ecr_repository_url.description: ECR repository URL (push your image here).

acm_certificate_arn.description: Optional: existing ACM certificate ARN to use for HTTPS. If empty and domain_name is set, a DNS-validated cert will be created.

az_count.description: Number of AZs to use (2 recommended).

container_port.description: Port the application listens on inside the container.

db_deletion_protection.description: Enable deletion protection on the DB.

db_multi_az.description: Whether to enable Multi-AZ for RDS.

db_skip_final_snapshot.description: Skip final snapshot on destroy (dev=true, prod=false).

domain_name.description: Optional: domain name to create Route53 record for (e.g., short.example.com). Leave empty to skip Route53/ACM.

enable_http_redirect.description: If true, create an HTTP (80) listener that redirects to HTTPS (443).

health_check_path.description: ALB target group health check path. Ensure your app serves this path.

hosted_zone_id.description: Optional: Route53 hosted zone ID for domain_name. Required if domain_name is set.

image_uri.description: Container image URI to deploy (e.g., <account>.dkr.ecr.<region>.amazonaws.com/repo:tag). If empty, uses the ECR repo created by this stack with tag 'latest'.

project_name.description: Project/name prefix used for resource naming.
